short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adding keyboard shortcuts (arrow keys) to Next and Previous buttons when searching for people on Linkedin.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension to be used with Linkedin.com.
The extension adds keyboard shortcuts (arrow keys) to buttons.
